description:
The powervm driver is starting to be functional in the Pike release but there is no mention of it in the in-tree feature support matrix:

https://docs.openstack.org/developer/nova/support-matrix.html

Especially for things like VNC console support now:

https://review.openstack.org/#/c/409402/

It's pretty bare for a driver at the moment, but there might be other things in there to report, like host and instance status, launch instance, shutdown instance, etc.
title: The powervm driver is not in the feature support matrix

comments.content:
The powervm driver is starting to be functional in the Pike release but there is no mention of it in the in-tree feature support matrix:

https://docs.openstack.org/developer/nova/support-matrix.html

Especially for things like VNC console support now:

https://review.openstack.org/#/c/409402/

It's pretty bare for a driver at the moment, but there might be other things in there to report, like host and instance status, launch instance, shutdown instance, etc.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/470999
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=0fbb97f3c3947c4d0f7c4b05db9cb1fd07139b9d
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 0fbb97f3c3947c4d0f7c4b05db9cb1fd07139b9d
Author: Eric Berglund <email address hidden>
Date:   Mon Jun 5 10:54:44 2017 -0400

    Add PowerVM to nova support matrix
    
    Base PowerVM support has been added to nova [1-7]. This updates the
    support matrix to include PowerVM features.
    
    [1] https://review.openstack.org/#/c/438119/
    [2] https://review.openstack.org/#/c/438598/
    [3] https://review.openstack.org/#/c/438729/
    [4] https://review.openstack.org/#/c/427380/
    [5] https://review.openstack.org/#/c/391288/
    [6] https://review.openstack.org/#/c/409402/
    [7] https://review.openstack.org/#/c/443189/
    
    Closes-Bug: #1693083
    Partially-Implements: blueprint powervm-nova-compute-driver
    
    Change-Id: I0583400b546d3cb32f2fe828711df8272c5ab5af
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 16.0.0.0b3 development milestone.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
